technicalDetails:
Features: blockbuster sound produced for games, movies, bullet, and hit.

  •  High-quality tracks that no one can compare to.

Documentation: Link (or a description of where users can find) the documentation

Important/Additional Notes:

Important/Additional Notes: This project is written in 4.26.1 version, but only audio files and audio queues are attached. It can work in the old version even if the version of the engine you use is different, and if there is a problem with the file after purchase, we will send you the original copy separately when we prove the payment.
